trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.MarginBounds%2A> property retrieves the rectangular area that represents the portion of the page between the margins.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.MarginBounds%2A> propriedade recupera a área retangular que representa a parte da página entre as margens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageBounds%2A> property retrieves the rectangular area that represents the total area of the page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageBounds%2A> propriedade recupera a área retangular que representa a área total da página.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property defines the graphics object with which to do the painting.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedade define o objeto de gráfico com o qual fazer a pintura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> property retrieves the printer settings for the current page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.PageSettings%2A> propriedade recupera as configurações da impressora para a página atual.

trans-unit.source: The remaining properties indicate whether a print job should be canceled or whether a print job has more pages.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades restantes de indicarem se um trabalho de impressão deve ser cancelado ou se um trabalho de impressão tem mais páginas.

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir com formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing> namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `printButton` and a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> named `pd` have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir pressupõe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `printButton` e um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> chamado `pd` foram criadas em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is associated with the `printButton_Click` method and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is associated with the `pd_PrintPage` method in the example.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> está associado a `printButton_Click` método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> está associado a `pd_PrintPage` método no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The `printButton_Click` method from the example calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method raising the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, and prints the .bmp file specified in the `pd_PrintPage` method.
trans-unit.target: O `printButton_Click` método de exemplo chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método gerando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos e imprime o arquivo. bmp especificado no `pd_PrintPage` método.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, change the path to the bitmap you want to print.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, altere o caminho para o bitmap que você deseja imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o item.

trans-unit.source: The area between the margins.
trans-unit.target: A área entre as margens.

trans-unit.source: The total area of the paper.
trans-unit.target: A área total do papel.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> for the page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings" /> para a página.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the print job should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o trabalho de impressão deve ser cancelado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the print job should be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o trabalho de impressão deve ser cancelado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar a página.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the page.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar a página.

trans-unit.source: The following code example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `printButton` and a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> named `pd` have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir pressupõe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `printButton` e um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> chamado `pd` foram criadas em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is associated with the `printButton_Click` method and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is associated with the `pd_PrintPage` method in the example.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> está associado a `printButton_Click` método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> está associado a `pd_PrintPage` método no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The `printButton_Click` method from the example calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method raising the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, and prints the .bmp file specified in the `pd_PrintPage` method.
trans-unit.target: O `printButton_Click` método de exemplo chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método gerando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos e imprime o arquivo. bmp especificado no `pd_PrintPage` método.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, change the path to the bitmap you want to print.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, altere o caminho para o bitmap que você deseja imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an additional page should be printed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma página adicional deve ser impressa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an additional page should be printed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> caso uma página adicional deva ser impressa; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example assumes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `printButton` and a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> named `pd` have been created on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir pressupõe um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `printButton` e um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> chamado `pd` foram criadas em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is associated with the `printButton_Click` method and the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is associated with the `pd_PrintPage` method in the example.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> está associado a `printButton_Click` método e o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> está associado a `pd_PrintPage` método no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The `printButton_Click` method from the example calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> method raising the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event, and prints the .bmp file specified in the `pd_PrintPage` method.
trans-unit.target: O `printButton_Click` método de exemplo chama o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A> método gerando o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> eventos e imprime o arquivo. bmp especificado no `pd_PrintPage` método.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, change the path to the bitmap you want to print.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, altere o caminho para o bitmap que você deseja imprimir.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces for this example.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespaces para este exemplo.

trans-unit.source: For another example that shows how to use <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A>, see [How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md)
trans-unit.target: Para obter outro exemplo que mostra como usar <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.HasMorePages%2A>, consulte [como: imprimir um arquivo de texto com várias páginas no Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md)

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangular area that represents the portion of the page inside the margins.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área retangular que representa a parte da página dentro das margens.

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area, measured in hundredths of an inch, that represents the portion of the page inside the margins.
trans-unit.target: A área retangular, medida em centésimos de polegada, que representa a parte da página dentro das margens.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangular area that represents the total area of the page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área retangular que representa a área total da página.

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area that represents the total area of the page.
trans-unit.target: A área retangular que representa a área total da página.

trans-unit.source: Most printers cannot print at the very edge of the page.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das impressoras não é possível imprimir na borda da página.

trans-unit.source: Gets the page settings for the current page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de página da página atual.

trans-unit.source: The page settings for the current page.
trans-unit.target: As configurações de página da página atual.
